goal: Enhance the comparison logic in 'eval_pipeline/result_comparator.py' to include semantic similarity, keyword checks, and causal chain analysis, and add appropriate test cases for the new functionality.

tasks.description: Implement semantic similarity comparison logic in 'eval_pipeline/result_comparator.py'.

delegation_details.description: Develop semantic similarity logic to compare agent output and ground truth.
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria: Semantic similarity logic is implemented and integrated into the 'compare' method.

delegation_details.description: Develop keyword matching logic to enhance comparison accuracy.
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria: Keyword checks are implemented and integrated into the 'compare' method.

tasks.description: Incorporate causal chain analysis into the comparison logic in 'eval_pipeline/result_comparator.py'.

delegation_details.description: Develop causal chain analysis logic to compare agent output and ground truth.
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria: Causal chain analysis is implemented and integrated into the 'compare' method.

tasks.description: Add test cases to validate the new comparison logic in 'tests/eval_pipeline/test_result_comparator.py'.

delegation_details.description: Develop unit tests to ensure the correctness of the new comparison logic.
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria: Test cases cover all new comparison logic and pass successfully.
